name: Season Swap
description:
"Season Swap" is truly one of the games ever made.

The seasons have gotten all scrambled up and stuff, and it's you job to do something about it! Touch the flags or something, maybe that'll help idk. To help you in your journey, you can absorb the seasons of the terrain by standing on them and holding L. Fight and jump your way through over 5 levels! Season Swap!

Movement: WASD

Jump: M

Attack: K

Absorb: L

Needs way way more levels, but I'm tired. Maybe I'll add stuff later.

Also yes it has sound it's just super quiet and also ultra high bitrate you need like super hifi audio equipment to hear it but trust me it's there you just don't have like good enough headphones and all that.

Art by Swagreus - https://twitter.com/ChooChooPlants
